a. (5) 0x000000C4bin
// positive number
= 00000000 00000000 00000000 11000100 = 11000100
= 2**7 + 2**6 + 2**2 = 196


b. (5) 0xFFFFFEC6
// negative number: ~x + 1 = -x -> -x(-1) = x (slide1 p14)
= 11111111 11111111 11111110 11000110 -> 00000000 00000000 00000001 00111001 
= 0x00000139
-> 0x00000139 + 0x1 = 0x0000013A
= 00000000 00000000 00000001 00111010 = 100111010
= 2**8 + 2**5 + 2**4 + 2**3 + 2**1 = 314
-> 314 * (-1) = -314


c. (5) 0xFFFFFFFF
// negative number: ~x + 1 = -x -> -x(-1) = x (slide1 p14)
= 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 -> 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
= 0x00000000
-> 0x00000000 + 0x1 = 0x00000001
= 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001 = 00000001
= 2**0 = 1
-> 1 * (-1) = -1
